participant_2.background:
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
I love my cats and badminton.
I like to look at travel websites to plan my next vacation.
I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons.
I am a quiet, but hardworking individual who is eager to learn and contribute to your company.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in your spare time?
I like to watch cartoons and look at travel websites to plan my next vacation.
That sounds fun! I like to go out to eat with my friends, play music, and create beautiful things.
What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing. I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
That's really cool! I wish I could play an instrument. I'm not very good at anything creative.
You should try it! It's never too late to learn. I started playing guitar when I was 16.
I might! Thanks for the encouragement. What's your favorite thing to eat when you go out with your friends?
I love trying new foods, but I always go back to pizza. I love the combination of cheese, sauce, and crust.
I love pizza too! What's your favorite topping?
I like pepperoni and pineapple. It's a weird combination, but it's so good!
I've never tried pineapple on pizza, but I'm not opposed to it. I'm a big fan of pepperoni, mushrooms, and olives.
Those are all great toppings! I love olives on pizza too.
Me too! I think we'd get along really well.
